quoteText:
If you are misusing, abusing, or putting a large amount of strain on our systems, we will ask you to stop or to pay a small usage fee.&nbsp.
If you disregard our requests, we reserve the right to terminate your account or otherwise block your access.
title: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly

tosdr.case: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly
